XII.ii.3.A.5.a
.
Jurisdiction for REPS Claims
The St. Louis RO manages the processing of REPS claims.
ROs must e-mail (to
REPS.VBASTL@va.gov
) or fax ((844) 537-7818)
all
VA Forms 21P-8924
and REPS-related correspondence without establishing end product control or taking any further action.
title: M21-1, Part XII, Subpart ii, Chapter 3, Section A - Overview of the Restored Entitlement Program for Survivors (REPS)
citation: Part XII, Subpart ii, Chapter 3, Section A
